###  Purpose

This HL7® IG defines FHIR R4 profiles, extensions and value sets needed to exchange SDOH content defined by the Gravity Project. It defines how to represent coded content used to support the following care activities: screening, clinical assessment/diagnosis, goal setting, and the planning and performing of interventions. It addresses the need to gather SDOH information in the context of clinical encounters and describes how to share SDOH information and other relevant information with outside organizations for the purpose of coordinating services and support to address SDOH related needs. It also demonstrates how to share clinical data to support secondary purposes such as population health, quality, and research. It supports the following use cases:
1.	Document SDOH data in conjunction with the patient encounter,
2.	Document and track SDOH related interventions to completion,
3.	Gather and aggregate SDOH data for uses beyond the point of care (e.g. public health, population health, quality measurement, risk adjustment, quality improvement, and research.)


### How to Use This Guide

A FHIR IG address the needs of multiple audiences. It provides technical artifacts that assist programmers when implementing standards-based FHIR application program interfaces (APIs) for specific purposes. It provides instructive material that explains how FHIR is used to accomplish specific uses cases. It also provides general information that helps business analysts and technology decision-makers understand the use cases and benefits associated with acheiving specific data exchange capabilities. A FHIR IG is as much a business planning tool as it is an educational resource and a technical specification.

resource.name: SDOHCC Observation ScreeningResponseBase 1
resource.description: This profile constrains Observations that represent individual Question and Answer (QA) pairs from SDOH screening instruments that are represented in LOINC.

resource.name: SDOHCC Condition Base 1
resource.description: This profile constrains Conditions that represent Social Determinants of Health.

resource.name: SDOHCC Goal Base 1
resource.description: This profile constrains Goals that address Social Determinants of Health.

resource.name: SDOHCC ServiceRequest Base 1
resource.description: This profile constrains ServiceRequest that address Social Determinants of Health.

resource.name: SDOHCC Procedure Base 1
resource.description: This profile constrains Procedures that address Social Determinants of Health.

resource.name: Patient Colin Abbas
resource.description: Patient example for Colin Abbas who is used as the subject in the Observation and Condition examples.

resource.name: SDOHCC QuestionnaireResponse HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of an SDC QuestionnaireResponse that represents the individual Question and Answer pairs (QA pairs) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example represents the LOINC 88121-9 Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire. The example is generated using the LHC-Forms SDC Questionnaire App.

resource.name: SDOHCC Questionnaire HungerVitalSign 1
resource.description: A Questionnaire instance that represents the individual Question and Answer pairs (QA pairs) from a specific SDOH screening questionnaire. This instance represents the LOINC 88121-9 Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Observation HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of an Observation that represents the individual Question and Answer pair (QA pair) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example represents LOINC code 88122-7 from the Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Observation HungerVitalSign Example 2
resource.description: An example of an Observation that represents the individual Question and Answer pair (QA pair) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example represents LOINC code 88123-5 from the Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Observation HungerVitalSign Example 3
resource.description: An example of an Observation that represents the individual Question and Answer pair (QA pair) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example represents LOINC code 88124-3 from the Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Observation HungerVitalSignGroup 1
resource.description: An example of an Observation that represents the Observation group which has as its members the Observations that represent the individual Question and Answer pairs (QA pairs) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example is the group of 3 Observations that represent the 3 questions from LOINC code 88121-9 which is the Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Condition HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of a Condition that represents a health concern based on an Observation instance or instances which represent the individual Question and Answer pairs (QA pairs) from an SDOH screening questionnaire represented in LOINC. This example represents a health concern that references, as evidence, Observations derived from the LOINC 88121-9 Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC StructureMap HungerVitalSignMapper 1
resource.description: A StructureMap instance that represents the resource that transforms individual Question and Answer pairs (QA pairs) from the LOINC 88121-9 Hunger Vital Sign [HVS] questionnaire to their corresponding Observations (SDOHCC_Observation_HungerVitalSign_Example_1, SDOHCC_Observation_HungerVitalSign_Example_2, and SDOHCC_Observation_HungerVitalSign_Example_3) and Condition (SDOHCC_Condition_HungerVitalSign_Example_1).

resource.name: SDOHCC Task Base 1
resource.description: This profile constrains Tasks that address Social Determinants of Health.

resource.name: SDOHCC CodeSystem Temporary Codes
resource.description: A local code system defined within the context of the SDOH-ClinicalCare IG.

resource.name: SDOHCC Goal HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of a Goal that addresses a Condition of Food Insecurity. The code used for Goal.description and Goal.target.measure is a LOINC code that was only selected for demonstration purposes and will be replaced when new codes (submitted by Gravity) are added to LOINC.

resource.name: SDOHCC ServiceRequest HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of a ServiceRequest that references as its reason a Condition of Food Insecurity.

resource.name: SDOHCC Procedure HungerVitalSign Example 1
resource.description: An example of a Procedure that is based on a ServiceRequest and references as its reason a Condition of Food Insecurity.

resource.name: SDOHCC Task OrderFulfillment Example 1
resource.description: An example of a Task that has as its Task.focus a ServiceRequest to provide food.

resource.name: SDOHCC ValueSet SDOHDomain 1
resource.description: This value set is defined extensionally to include concepts that represent Social Determinant of Health domains.

resource.name: SDOHCC Consent
resource.description: This is a profile on the Consent resource to allow declaration of consent provided by the patient to share the SDOH informaiton, including ServiceRequest with external entities.

resource.name: SDOCHCC Group
resource.description: This is a profile on the Group resource to allow collections of individuals with SDOH data to be easily exchange with allowed organizations.
